info.name: Ashar Standard
info.description: Circle of the Ancients Magic Longsword
info.author: ArseniusAri

description.p: An Ashar Standard is a magic longsword made from wood and bone from a Tyranosaurus Rex.Made specificially for druids of the Circle of the Ancients.

While attuned to an Ashar Standard, if you are not already proficient with it, you gain proficiency with it. You gain two additional uses of your wild shape each day. In addition, the length of each wild shape is doubled.

set.name: type
set.addition: any sword that deals slashing damage
